name: FLEE (DecestiaDev)
description:
Traverse a maze with a fluctuating layout, locate cells of light and evade the ever-approaching darkness.


-----

[ HOW TO PLAY ]
  • Be Observant! 

-Locate and shatter the cells of light, a low hum signals one is near

  • Be Quick!

-Ensure that you're able to shatter at least one cell and return to safety each time that darkness falls

  • Be Persistent!

-Shatter enough cells to banish the darkness and achieve victory

  • FLEE

-If all else fails
